name: Cactusaster: Lost in space
description:
Cactusaster was first a flash game developed by us in 2018. This year, we make a better version available now on Android devices.

Avoid the cacti by controlling a spaceship through space for a long and infinite trip. Earned cells and use them to activate the "Ghost mode" on your spaceship and make your task easier for 10 seconds.

Get more scores, let them be converted to cells when you earn enough, and have a startling adventure in space!

Cactusaster is a good game to kill time, so let's play and enjoy it!
